name: Deep Fried Ice Cream Dogs Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: vegetable oil, hot dog bun, sugar, ice cream, your choice of toppings
recipeIngredient: Extra Toppings - Like sauce or sprinkles!
recipeInstructionSteps: Cut the hot dog bun in half, keeping it together a little if you can.
Fry in hot oil for about 30 seconds each side,
Allow to cool for 30 seconds, then fill with ice cream and cover in sauce!
